01_GTEx_Setbp1_decoupleR_inputs: 

TF regulation prior: CollecTRI (human)
* The prior network for decoupleR was constructed using [CollecTRI](https://github.com/saezlab/CollecTRI) for human on 230525. The file is located in this github repository as `data/human_prior_tri.csv`


Expression prior: GTEx expression data (tpm)
* 31 different tissues from human GTEx data, normalized by tpm. 
* input array (constructed in `src/GTEx_PANDA/02_PANDA.R`) located in repo as `results/array_inputs/GTEx_exp_files_array.txt`
